issues.description: The solution implementation uses snake_case field names (lecture_name, number_of_inscribed_students, number_of_guest_students, number_of_lecturers, number_of_tutors) which differ from the camelCase attribute names (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors) specified in the problem statementâ€™s UML diagram. This inconsistency can confuse students mapping problem requirements to the reference solution.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the field identifiers in Lecture.java to camelCase to match the UML diagram and problem statement: lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, and numberOfTutors.
